title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node + browser).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; sync & async, supports streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) that connects to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with REPL, conversation memory, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android compatible, supports streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET/C# client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose examples for CPU & GPU deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma in a single notebook.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models; per-user threads.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to summarize blocks or generate text using Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for the Ollama JavaScript client (mirror of ollama-js repo).

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python client (mirror of ollama-python repo).

title: ollama-models-registry
summary: Community-contributed model definitions (Modelfiles) for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client crate for Ollama with Tokio async and streaming support.
